product_name: Black Diamond WindWeight Liner Gloves - Men's
long_description: Black Diamond WindWeight form-fitting, breathable fleece gloves are designed to keep hands warm while allowing maximum digital dexterity. Liner gloves effectively insulate under a waterproof shell (not included) and resist blustery weather when worn solo. Polartec(R) Windbloc-ACT(R) fleece contours comfortably to your hands, blocks wind and allows excellent freedom of movement. Pittards(R) suede palms with silicon dots on thumbs and fingertips provide a sure grip and remain supple, even in wet weather. Elasticized wristbands keep the weather out and your body heat in.
short_description: Black Diamond WindWeight form-fitting, breathable fleece gloves are designed to keep hands warm while allowing maximum digital dexterity.
